tool.name: Check if
tool.description: files exist on disk and link.
tool.command: matlab -r "diary on; current_directory = pwd; cellorganizer_directory = getenv('CELLORGANIZER'); cd( cellorganizer_directory ); setup(); cd( current_directory ); check_if_files_exist_on_disk_and_link_them('$dataset'); diary off; exit"

param.name: dataset
param.label: Choose a data set for training

tool.help:
**Description**
Just a silly test to check if files exist on disk.
